entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:28 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 3:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 8.5°C

Humidity: 99 %

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
